select * into #$keys from @$keys declare @code varchar(4000) set @code = '' if exists(select 1 from #$keys where datalength(text) < 2049) select @code = cast(text as varchar(2048)) from #$keys
if dbo.AI_ERP$Function$CheckSQLInjection(@ma_bt) = 0 return declare @m_ma_nt0 varchar(10), @key varchar(4000), @bilingual tinyint, @l char(1) declare @q nvarchar(4000), @tableName varchar(33)
select @m_ma_nt0 = val from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @bilingual = case when @@form in ('030', '040', '130', '140') then 1 else 0 end select @l = case when @bilingual = 0 then @@language else 'V' end, @tableName = 'r00$' + rtrim(@nam) + replace(str(@ky, 2), ' ', '0')
select @key = 'ma_ct = ''PK9'' and b.ky = ' + rtrim(@ky) + ' and b.nam = ' + rtrim(@nam) select @key = @key + ' and ' + case when @code <> '' then 'b.ma_bt in (''' + replace(replace(@code, '''', ''''''), ',', ''',''') + ''')' else 'exists(select 1 from #$keys where patindex(''%,'' + rtrim(b.ma_bt) + '',%'', text) > 0)' end select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) -- select top 0 ma_nt, ps_no, ps_no_nt into #t from r00$000000
select @q = 'insert into #t select max(a.ma_nt), sum(a.ps_no), sum(a.ps_no_nt)' select @q = @q + ' from ' + @tableName + ' a with(nolock) left join dmpbky1 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec' select @q = @q + ' where (abs(ps_no) + abs(ps_no_nt) <> 0) and ' + @key + ' group by a.ma_ct' exec sp_executesql @q if not exists(select 1 from #t) insert into #t select @m_ma_nt0, 0, 0
-- select @ky as ky, @nam as nam, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, ps_no, @l) as t_ps_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(ma_nt, ps_no_nt, @l) as t_ps_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, ps_no, 'E') as t_ps_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(ma_nt, ps_no_nt, 'E') as t_ps_nt_in_word2 from #t
exec rs_PrintPeriodicTrans @@language, @key, @tableName, 'PK9', @bilingual
&ReportMarginQuery; &ReportSign.Report.Query;
